title: rustc panic: "Unable to fulfull trait ..." (cargo doc, stable)

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```
active toolchain
----------------

stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu (default)
rustc 1.46.0 (04488afe3 2020-08-24)
```
Steps to reproduce:
1) cd in https://github.com/hecrj/iced/tree/4f2962d73f3bdeeca8a11817e404c45e91e2c2cc/examples/game_of_life
2) `cargo doc --open`

```

 Documenting guillotiere v0.5.1
error: Could not document `glyph_brush_layout`.
```
